content: {"name": "Mount Holly Community Relief Organization", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Residents of Mt. Holly can receive a supply of food once every two months. Simply come to the CRO, tell us your name and address and other basic information, and we will bring you a cart of fresh, frozen and non-perishable food. Services are provided on a first-come, first-served basis. Clients must be signed in by 11:45 a.m. due to the time it takes to conduct an interview. Registration could end earlier depending on the number of people who come for services that day. ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cro-mtholly.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2120 Spring Street", "address_2": "P.O. Box 831", "city": "Mount Holly", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28120", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.28769339999999, "longitude": -81.01811099999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 827-0450", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Names of all household members"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Clients Can Visit: Six times per year"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
